requirements.text: Enhance the randomization algorithm in useQuizGame hook to ensure better distribution and variety when selecting questions from each category pool, preventing recently-shown questions from appearing again in the same game session
acceptanceCriteria: Questions are selected using an improved randomization algorithm that provides better distribution
The same question does not appear twice within a single game session
Random selection provides good variety across multiple game sessions

constraints: Maintain existing game structure of exactly 4 questions (one per category)
Preserve Persian language for all questions and UI text
Do not modify the immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity, useActor, main.tsx, components/ui)
nonGoals: Adding new question categories beyond the existing four
Changing the game mechanics or scoring system
Altering the UI design or color scheme
